ARABIC: لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The kingdom of the heavens and the earth belongs to Him. He gives life and causes to die. He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, He is the giver of life and death, and He has power over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: His is the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He gives life and causes death, and He has power over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He gives life and causes things to die. He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For Him only is the kingship of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and causes death; and He is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. It is He Who gives life and causes death; and He is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and causes death; and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life, and He makes to die, and He is powerful over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: His is the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; He quickeneth and He giveth death; and He is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has sovereign control over the heavens and the earth. He gives life and brings death. He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: His is the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He giveth life and He causeth to die; and He is over everything Potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth: He gives life and brings death, and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: It is He Who gives Life and Death; and He has Power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, It is He Who gives life and causes death; and He is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Him belongs the Kingdom in the heavens and earth. It is He who revives and causes to die, and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He gives life and causes death, and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [57:2] To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life, through [His act of] creation, and He brings death, thereafter, and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (His is the Sovereignty) His are the stores (of the heavens) i.e. rain (and the earth) i.e. vegetation; (He quickeneth) for the resurrection (and He giveth death) in the life of the world; (and He is Able to do things) of giving life and death.
